text: Nuko Shitani arabashuka (barya kuri cya giti), abakura mu byo bari barimo (ubuzima bwo mu ijuru). Turababwira tuti “Mumanuke muvemo (mu Ijuru) muri abanzi hagati yanyu (Shitani azaba umwanzi wanyu n’abazabakomokaho).” Isi ni yo izaba ubuturo bwanyu, kandi muzayigiramo umunezero kugeza igihe cyagenwe.”
